sentence: What do you call it when a golfer misses the hole? fore-play
explanation: This term refers to a warning call made by a golfer to indicate that a golf ball is heading towards someone. It also refers to sexual activity before intercourse.
first_new_sentence: A golfer yelled fore to warn those ahead of him about the approaching ball.
second_new_sentence: The couple enjoyed some fore-play before moving to the next stage of their intimacy.

sentence: What happens when you get a lot of electroshocks within a short period of time? it hertz
explanation: Hertz is a unit of frequency equivalent to one cycle per second, commonly used to measure electromagnetic frequencies. It is also a play on the word hurts, referring to the physical pain experienced.
first_new_sentence: The radio station broadcasts at a frequency of 100 megahertz.
second_new_sentence: The electrical shock caused him to wince in pain, and he exclaimed that it really hurts.
